EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners November Associate Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Associate Newsletter November 2013
2013 Wrap Up: Is your Business Center Ready for a New Year? As 2013 draws to a close, you may be asking yourself: is my business ready for a new year? Between the turkey and the tinsel, take time this holiday season to tie up any loose ends in your MBO Business Center.
In our last newsletter of the year, we wanted to gather items to help prepare for a New Year. Is your address up to date? Have you submitted all medical expenses? Are you familiar with the Account Balance Carry Over Policy? If not, take a look at our Account Balance Policy <http://info.mbopartners.com/YearEndWrapUp2013.html> and HR & Expense Reminders <http://info.mbopartners.com/YearEndHRUpdate2013.html> now to make sure you have completed everything you need for a successful 2014! If you have any questions, contact your Business Manager today.
Poll Results: Are You Part of the 88%? In our July Associate Newsletter, we asked you, our valued Associates, to take a poll on what motivates you as Independent Consultants. Thank you for participating, the quick survey helps us to tailor programs that will interest our Associates and we wanted to share with you some of the interesting results!
When it comes to lining up your next consulting project, 64% of our Associates find their next project leads from a colleague, while 56% look to their current client for the next gig. If your current clients or colleagues could lead to your next big deal, make sure you are doing the most to build lasting client relationships <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/6-tips-building-lasting-client-relationships>.
Social Media <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/5-ways-use-social-media-promote-your-independent-consulting-business> allows Independent Consultants the ability to connect with millions of potential, engaged online customers. Among our Associates, LinkedIn has the highest social media presence with 88% of respondents saying they have an active LinkedIn profile. Facebook was the second most used with 44% using Facebook to enhance their business. Twitter users only make up 28% of those polled. If you aren't promoting your business online, you could be missing potential clients and connections. Learn about the Do's and Don'ts of Social Media Consulting here <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/dos-and-don%E2%80%99ts-networking-and-marketing-your-consultancy-social-media>.
How to Keep your Independent Business Booming this Holiday Season Taking time for friends, family and relaxation during the holiday season is important, but that does not mean your independent business has to suffer. You can use holiday down time to make connections (both new and old) and ensure your business is booming in 2014!
Customers and prospects often get distracted with other objectives as the year winds down, and that may make it more difficult for you to connect with them. Losing face time (and phone time) with your customers will impact sales if you haven’t planned ahead. So, if the economy has you stressed and your independent contractor business can’t take a hiatus over the holidays, try these tactics to help reach your business goals and sign that next contract. Read More> <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/how-keep-business-booming-during-holidays> DID YOU KNOW? - It's that time of year! The annual MBO Partners Open Enrollment Period <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Open_Enrollment_Summary_2014.pdf> for Medical Benefits will last until December 13. Please contact your Business Manager with any questions. - You can fax, email or upload images of your expense receipts easily! Refer to pages 9-10 of our Expense Policy <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Expense_Policy.pdf>to ensure that you are saving time and submitting expenses properly. - MBO Access, the private online networking community for MBO Associates, is now mobile accessible! If you haven't already completed a profile, log in <https://idp.mbopartners.com/?resume=/idp/9nHSK/resumeSAML20/idp/SSO.ping&spentity=https://access.mbopartners.com> to start making connections today.
CEO CORNER 3 Reasons We Should Give Thanks to Independents this Season
Family, friends, good health and fried turkey – it’s not such a bad situation to be thankful for the same blessings, year in and year out.
But this year, all Americans, especially our business community, have nearly 18 million new reasons to be thankful this year: the self-employed workers that make our country tick. More> <http://info.mbopartners.com/CEOCornerNov13.html> EXECUTIVE EDITORIAL Jay Lash, VP Market Strategy, on a Malcolm Gladwell TedTalk
In my work, I am often challenged to think through a problem and come up with a solution. Sure, I have good experience to base my solutions on and I am a relatively bright guy, but that isn’t why I can make my living from coming up with solutions.
When I am posed these challenges I don’t just start solving, I study them first. More > <http://info.mbopartners.com/ExecEditorialJayLashNov2013.html>
MARKETING CORNER Get To Know Tom Kuder from Minnesota
Meet Minnesota-based Associate Tom Kuder. Tom considers himself a "marketing ecologist" and that philosophy formed the foundation of his independent consulting practice.
Tom's business tag line best explains his approach: Comprehend- Connect- Converse. More> <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/meet-the-independents-mn> SPOTLIGHT ON SERVICE Get to Know business manager Cara O'Brien
Get to know MBO Partners Business Manager Cara O'Brien, of Falls Church, VA, a graduate of Longwood University.
Assigned to the New York City Metro Region, Cara enjoys working with associates from a variety of backgrounds and career fields. More > <http://info.mbopartners.com/SpotlightonServiceNov2013.html> IN THIS ISSUE: - Year End Checklist - Poll Results - Associate Spotlight - Marketing Corner - CEO Corner - Executive Editorial - Spotlight on Service ASSOCIATE SPOTLIGHT
Fred Klapetzky
MBO Associate Since 11/2012 Meet MBO Associate Fred Klapetzky, who leads a team of consultants and specializes in high tech security services and disaster planning for information technology. The independent life has left Fred so re-energized and happy that even his friends and family have noticed his great new lifestyle! Full Interview <http://info.mbopartners.com/AssociateSpotlightNov2013.html> Referral Program MBO Partners Referral Program <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program> is celebrating one year of success! What are you waiting for? Refer a friend and earn an official entry in our Home Office Makeover Sweepstakes. Click here <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program> for more information and to start referring today.
WEBINARS The Affordable Care Act: What Independent Workers Need to Know
The sheer confusion around the Affordable Care Act is enough to give anyone a headache, but for the self-employed workers out there, it’s even more important to understand how the act impacts you and your family.
To help prepare for 2014, tune into our webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2013/affordable-care-act-what-independent-workers-need-know>on Thursday, December 12, 2013 from 1pm ET to 2pm ET. Gene Zaino and Dave Putt, both experts on the independent worker, will cut through the clutter and provide essential information on the new insurance practices. Register now! <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2013/affordable-care-act-what-independent-workers-need-know>
MBO IN THE NEWS - You Might Be Surprised at the Current State of Independent Workers <http://smallbiztrends.com/2013/11/current-state-independent-workers.html> - Freelancers Are Getting Pulled Into Worker Misclassification Fights <http://www.businessweek.com/articles/2013-10-22/freelancers-are-getting-pulled-into-worker-misclassification-fights>
LOOKING FOR A WORKSPACE? Trying to impress important clients is not easy from your living room, which is why MBO has teamed up with Liquidspace to offer you a great deal. Liquidspace is an application that connects people seeking workspace with venues that have space to share. As an MBO Associate you will receive 20% off your first space! contact lebert@mbopartners.com <mailto:lebert@mbopartners.com> for more information today.
NEW LEADS IN 5 MINUTES Looking for new clients? Who isn't? Our partner Zintro provides lead generation for consultants and other subject matter experts. Zintro's Basic Services are free and MBO has arranged for a deep discount for its associates to upgrade to Zintro's Premium Services. Click here <http://info.zintro.com/MBO-ExSU?aff=_MBO-NV&> to learn more about Zintro.
FOR MORE INFORMATION CONTACT MBO PARTNERS: 1-800-220-0469
